channel.title: Need help running a client, Quick!
channel.description:
Hey this ain't my server, it's a friend server and it won't run. ( all other clients give me same error - Besides Crisisx and another 1 )
Hey, when I try to run clients I always get this. ( I set my variables correctly, i used the downloadable thingy to do it ) MY RUNBATCH: [code]@echo off title Client echo 1 Official OSO echo 2 Localhost set /p ip="Enter option: " java -Xmx300m client %ip% pause[/code]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/i77nmq.png[/img]
PLZ SOME1 PLZZZ

I used the Downloadable thing on this site to set Classpath and suchs…

Read full topic

item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

download java, set up PATH and CLASSPATH.

Get your friend to send you the right file, You are missing something.

item.description:

The JVM can’t find the client class, or the path is incorrect.
